name: com.unity.ide.vscodefork
description: Unity code editor integration for VSCode-based forks (Antigravity, Cursor, Trae) and Zed. Generates csproj/solution files, auto-discovers installations, and launches editors with reuse-window options.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Add Zed discovery and launch support (macOS/Linux) and seed .zed settings.json
- Add Trae fork discovery, launch, and reuse-window preference
- Rename package to com.unity.ide.vscodefork and support VSCode-based forks (Antigravity, Cursor)
